body_html: I was wondering if there was a version of the code where the dropout worked with the JIT? I reported similar issues with the dropout last December and was hoping that it would work one day. My current net is 99% CPU bound in python, especially at the inference, so the GPU is almost idle while the CPU is hogged at 1000%. The JIT really helped when it worked. Thanks!
